Class Nonces

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netscape.certsrv.base.Nonces
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthInfo

    public class Nonces
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuthInfo
    This class manages nonces sometimes used to control request state flow.
